Compression algorithm: None, RLE, ZIP, Piz, PXR24, and B44, B44A, DWAA, DWAB

Transparency: yes; 1bpp plane-only mask using color index

Color depth: 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 64 EHB, 128, 256 (HAM6 pseudo 12-bit), 4,096 pure HAM8 pseudo 18-bit), and 24-bit

Compression algorithm: Lossy and lossless original mutiresolution analysis transformation
Lossy (and partly lossless), DCT, RLE, and Huffman predictive nearest neighbor

Color depth: 8 and 16 (greyscale) with possibly color up to 48-bit
XYZ (8bpc, 16bpc, float16bpc, float32bpc), L*a*b* and YCbCr (8bpc, 16bpc, float32bpc)
indexed (8bpc), grayscale and RGB (8bpc, 16bpc, float16bpc, 32bpc, float32bpc, float64bpc)
